name: The Duck Saga
description:
The Duck Force relies on you to locate King Duck who has been abducted by the mysterious organization called AMARICA, rumor are circulating that they are developing a new generation of biological weapons. You must travel to their headquarter while fighting off predators that want a piece of you. Find out what AMARICA is up to, and find our King. Good luck.

Choose your class: 

  • Warrior
    • J: Peck Attack
    • K: Beak Charge - Front charge attack
    • L: Warrior's Aura - Aura that boost damage and attack speed for short amount of time
  • Mage 
    • J: Water Attack 
    • K: Explosion Egg - Throw an egg that explode and deal AOE damage
    • L: Hydro Blast - Shoot a stream of water that damage all enemy on the path
  • Archer 
    • J: Feather Attack 
    • K: Hawk Eye - Increase damage for short duration
    • L: Feather Storm - Increase attack speed
  • Rogue
    • J: Wing Attack
    • K: Haste - Dash ability makes avoiding attacks easier
    • L: Final Strike - Strike enemy 3-5 time consecutively with guarantee critical damage at quick speed

Each class have a unique skill-sets and base stat (HP, Damage, Attack Speed, Range, Critical Damage) that allow for different style of gameplay. 

Travel through 3 unique locations and fight up to 7 types of predators along the way.

Beware of certain predators attack indicate by these icons.

Software: 

  • Adobe Photoshop CC
  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • Audacity

Notes

  • Game does not have animation at the moment
  • Certain features may not be working as intended due to time constraint (and procrastination)
  • Dev Cheat: 0
    • Used for testing, or if game is too difficult since we ran out of time for balancing.
